title: Una vida menos en Canarias
overview: Luis Lacasa, a prestigious homicide inspector in Madrid, is forced to accept a transfer to the Canary Islands and adapt to everything he hates: the heat, the sand and the tourists, but above all to Naira, a charismatic inspector, a lover of her land with whom, despite their differences and rivalries, he forms a good team and at the same time, a complicity that questions his ironclad beliefs.
